messages.title: Let’s get Brexit done. Let’s get on with the country's priorities.
Don't risk another hung parliament.
messages.content: Last time, the Conservatives were only nine seats short of a majority. This time will be just as close.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting income tax for 32 million people.
Gigabit broadband for the whole country.
More than £35 million to safeguard Wales’ environment.
An extra £1.3bn available to spend on Wales’ roads.
£1.2 billion extra to invest in our Welsh NHS.
More funding available for schools across Wales.
£700 million to deliver Growth Deals across Wales.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Brecon and Radnorshire is one of the seats the Conservatives need to gain for a secure majority. Proposes to influence the voters with tactical voting recommendations.

issues.economy: Cutting income tax for 32 million people.
issues.education: More funding available for schools across Wales.
issues.environment: More than £35 million to safeguard Wales’ environment.
issues.health: £1.2 billion extra to invest in our Welsh NHS.

contactInformation.address: CCHQ, 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ

endorsements.endorsement: SNP to back Labour government will seek Scottish independence vote.
Swinson says of Plaid Cymru, Tory alliance tactical.
Polls tell tale of hung parliament between slim Tory majority.
